nodes.text: Mon Gazza was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Mid Rim along the Corellian Run. It hosted raw spice mining operations, which were controlled by the Pyke Syndicate during the Clone Wars. A number of weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, Soran Keize, an ex-member of the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, traveled to Mon Gazza, where he was caught up in a war between spice traders. Keize chose to move on when the violence escalated.

At some point, it hosted podraces. Prior to the rise of the First Order, a famous heist took place on Mon Gazza, in which the Spice Runners of Kijimi successfully evaded a New Republic patrol through the Zugga Challenge podrace course.
